Recipe.title: Hot Dogs
Recipe.text: Fill a pot with water and place the pot on the stove under high heat
Remove your hot dogs from the packaging.
Place the hot dogs into the water.
Wait for the water to come to a boil.
Once the water is boiling, wait 1 minute for the hot dogs to cook.
Carefully remove the hot dogs from the boiling water and place onto bread.

Recipe.title: Ramen
Recipe.text: Remove the ramen from the packaging. There will be a pack of noodles and a packet of seasoning.
Put water into a pot and place the pot on the stove on high heat.
Place the noodles into the water. Wait for the water to come to a boil, and continue cooking for 5 minutes.
After the noodles have cooked, add the seasoning packet to the water.
Strain the water and noodles through a collander. Place the noodles into a bowl and enjoy.
